mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoot.shoot_info (content, price, takeTime, takeLocation, takeResult, creationDate, typeId, costId, requireRoles,requireSecurityAccount,shootAddressId,stateId,userId,themeId )VALUES (#{content},#{price},#{takeTime},#{takeLocation},#{takeResult},#{creationDate}, #{typeId},#{costId},#{requireRoles},#{requireSecurityAccount},#{shootAddressId},1,#{userId},#{themeId})
mapper.select:
SELECT i.*,u.id u_id,u.member,u.portyaitl,u.securityMoney,u.userName,u.phone, t.id t_id,t.typeName,st.id st_id,st.costName,r.id r_id,r.roleName, a.id a_id,p.id p_id,p.prow,c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, sty.id sty_id,yl.id yl_id,yl.styleName,te.id te_id FROM shoot_info i INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON i.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_type t ON i.typeId=t.id INNER JOIN shoot_cost st ON i.costId=st.id INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=i.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON a.prow_id=p.id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON a.city_id=c.id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON a.country_id=co.id INNER JOIN shoot_state te ON i.stateId=te.id LEFT JOIN shoot_info_style sty ON sty.infoId=i.id LEFT JOIN shoot_style yl ON sty.styleId=yl.id
i.id=#{id}

SELECT i.id i_id, u.id u_id,u.userName,r.id r_id,r.roleName, p.id p_id,p.prow,ci.id ci_id,ci.city, try.id try_id,try.country,st.id st_id,st.costName FROM shoot_info i LEFT JOIN shoot_user u ON i.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON u.id=ur.userId LEFT JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId LEFT JOIN shoot_cost st ON i.costId=st.id LEFT JOIN shoot_address a ON i.shootAddressId=a.id LEFT JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id LEFT JOIN shoot_city ci ON ci.id=a.city_id LEFT JOIN shoot_country try ON try.id=a.country_id WHERE i.id=#{id}

SELECT u.*,i.id i_id,i.content,i.creationDate,ty.id ty_id, ty.typeName,p.id p_id,p.prow,c.id c_id,c.city, co.id co_id,co.country,st.id st_id,st.costName, te.id te_id,te.stateName,r.id r_id,r.roleName FROM shoot_user u INNER JOIN shoot_info i ON i.userId=u.id inner join shoot_user_role ur on ur.userId=u.id inner join shoot_role r on r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=i.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON p.id=a.prow_id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON c.id=a.city_id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON co.id=a.country_id INNER JOIN shoot_cost st ON st.id=i.costId INNER JOIN shoot_state te ON te.id=i.stateId INNER JOIN shoot_type ty ON ty.id=i.typeId WHERE u.id=#{userId}

SELECT i.*,u.id u_id,u.member,u.portyaitl,u.securityMoney,u.userName, t.id t_id,t.typeName,st.id st_id,st.costName,r.id r_id,r.roleName, a.id a_id,p.id p_id,p.prow,c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, stt.id stt_id,stt.stateName,u.userCode,u.* FROM shoot_info i INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON i.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_type t ON i.typeId=t.id INNER JOIN shoot_cost st ON i.costId=st.id INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=i.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON a.prow_id=p.id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON a.city_id=c.id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON a.country_id=co.id INNER JOIN shoot_state stt ON i.stateid=stt.id WHERE 1=1
and i.stateId=#{stateid}

SELECT i.*,u.id u_id,u.member,u.portyaitl,u.securityMoney,u.userName, t.id t_id,t.typeName,st.id st_id,st.costName,r.id r_id,r.roleName, a.id a_id,p.id p_id,p.prow,c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, stt.id stt_id,stt.stateName,u.userCode,u.* FROM shoot_info i INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON i.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_type t ON i.typeId=t.id INNER JOIN shoot_cost st ON i.costId=st.id INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=i.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON a.prow_id=p.id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON a.city_id=c.id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON a.country_id=co.id INNER JOIN shoot_state stt ON i.stateid=stt.id WHERE i.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE shoot_info SET stateId=#{stateId} WHERE id=#{id}
